snippet: About 850 senior move managers in the United States are helping older adults manage the psychological toll of finding a new home.
abstract: Many real estate agents now specialize in helping older adults navigate through both practical and psychological aspects of finding new homes; these realtors help clients with everything from reverse mortgages and estate sales to packing and selling their belongings; so-called senior move managers address needs of clients that are somewhat different, and often less joyous, from younger home sellers and buyers.
lead_paragraph: About 850 senior move managers in the United States are helping older adults manage the psychological toll of finding a new home.

headline.main: Real Estate Agents for Older Adults Are Part Broker, Part Therapist
headline.print_headline: Real Estate Agents for Older Adults Are Part Broker, Part Therapist
